newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea NLCF not buying to 14,000T oilseed meal.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea NLCF not buying to 14,000T oilseed meal.

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) said on Tuesday it was unable to buy 7,000 tonnes of cottonseed meal and 7,000 tonnes of rapeseed meal as there were no offers.
Tenders were asked to be submitted by 11.00 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Tuesday but no one did, an NLCF official said.
He said the federation had no plan to re-invite tenders at the moment.
The NLCF's original plan called for rapeseed meal shipment between February 14-March 5 if sourced from China or February 2-21 if sourced from India.
It also sought shipment for the cottonseed meal between February 2-28.
